name: online-store
author: Kirill
description: online store on stack: postgre node express sequelize

scripts.lint: cd server && npm run lint && cd ../client && npm run lint
scripts.format: cd server && npm run format && cd ../client && npm run format
scripts.pre-commit: cd server && npm run pre-commit && cd ../client && npm run pre-commit
scripts.install-dependencies: npm install && cd server && npm install && cd ../client && npm install
scripts.build: cd server && npm run build && cd ../client && npm run build
scripts.start:production: cd server && npm run start:production && cd ../client && npm run start:production
